Package insa.h4401.controller

Provides the classes necessary to control all elements of this applications.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppMediator
    This class implements the Mediator Pattern and is responsible for attaching the main window to the scene as it is not possible to get the current instance of a javaFX application The start method should be called by launch(AppMediator.class, args)
    ContextManager
    This class manages both commands and the main state machine of the application
    Controller
    This class is the main controller, its role is to initialize properly the application and its graphics components.
    IOManager
    This class manages Input/Output interactions with the File System
    ModelManager
    This class manages the model of the application, it is responsible of instanciating objects of the model and guarantee model's consistency
    UIManager
    This controller manages all the view and is notified when something happens on the view.

Package insa.h4401.controller Description

Provides the classes necessary to control all elements of this applications.

The main controller is the class Controller, and we have others manager like UIManager which control the view.
